data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Sinajana, Guam by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sinajana, Guam
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Sinajana, Guam the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Sinajana words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, help 5 new simple churches start among the 2,600 people in the state of Sinajana, Guam. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sinajana Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sinajana Village, Sinajana, Guam.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Sinajana, Guam.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Sinajana.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sinajana, Guam has a population of 2,600.

We estimate Sinajana has 413 people who might know Jesus, 1,992 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 194 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Sinajana, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.
